Package com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component.Component
      • com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToggleButton
    public class Button
extends Component
implements MouseListener
    Represents a rectangular button that can accept a listener to run code when the button is pressed.
    Author:
    zabzabdoda
